content: CFS-EOS QS Edge of Slab QuickSeal Firestop preformed solution for sealing edge-of-slab joints – high-speed, no-mess, spray-free installation ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Ready to use joints and cavity barriers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Dry installation – clean handling and free from mineral wool fibers, spray or extra equipment Immediate rain resistance – virtually eliminates the risk of water damage and wash-out Zero waste – predictable material cost, for simpler and more accurate bidding Suitable for a wider temperature range than traditional sprays and sealants Optional water tightness for bracket and butt joint areas using CFS-EOS WaterStop sealant Applications Sealing building perimeter gaps between floor slabs and exterior curtain wall façades For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 2 g/l Approvals: Intertek Length: 60 in Technical Data | Approvals | Intertek | Length | 60 in | Application | Other | Movement | Yes | Storage and transportation temperature range | 122 - 14 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2324964 - NOMINAL JOINT SIZE 2; FOR JOINT RANGES 1.5-3 - Package Size 28 pc - 2324965 - NOMINAL JOINT SIZE 3; FOR JOINT RANGES 2-4 - Package Size 21 pc - 2324966 - NOMINAL JOINT SIZE 4; FOR JOINT RANGES 3-5 - Package Size 15 pc
